subject: Lockouts
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The lockout has been a boon for the Russia-based Kontinental Hockey League, as Alex Ovechkin, Evgeni Malkin and others have returned to their hometown clubs.
snippet: The lockout has been a boon for the Russia-based Kontinental Hockey League, as Alex Ovechkin, Evgeni Malkin and others have returned to their hometown clubs.
